successes.title: PowerUp 3.0 - Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane
successes.description: PowerUp 3.0 turns your self-made paper airplane into a smartphone-controlled flying machine

Pledges.description: WE LIKE YOU TOO -- Kickstarter Edition PowerUp 3.0 PDF template with folding instructions.
SHAI SAYS HI -- A personalized pre-folded paper airplane on PowerUp 3.0-certified paper template, signed by Shai.
EARLY BIRD -- Our BASIC PACKAGE limited for early birds.
BAREBONE -- 1 PowerUp 3.0 Smart Module, 1 spare propeller. (Paper and charger not included.)

BASIC PACKAGE -- 1 PowerUp 3.0 Smart Module, 1 spare propeller, 5 sheets of PowerUp-certified paper templates and 1 quick-charging battery pack (4xAA batteries not included) with exclusive Kickstarter Edition packaging.

PERFECT PACKAGE -- Fly your PowerUp 3.0 airplane non-stop. Charge one while you fly the other. Includes 1 BAREBONE, 1 BASIC PACKAGE, 1 Lithium Polymer rechargeable power pack (1000 mAh) good for 13x10-minute flights, a USB wall adapter (220V/110V), and a personalized pre-folded paper plane signed by Shai.
HACKER PACKAGE -- Build your own app and hardware! Includes the BASIC PACKAGE and 1 additional PCB,  2 Lipo batteries, 4 motors, 4 coils, the Hacker Handbook and a ”I hacked PowerUp 3.0” T-shirt.

BETA PACKAGE -- Be the first to fly! Join the BETA program and help us improve our product. Your PowerUp 3.0 production prototype ships within 2 weeks after we’re funded. Includes the PERFECT PACKAGE and the BETA Guide Handbook.

DOGFIGHT PACKAGE -- Lets you play 2 against 2 and have mid-air team battles using the new Dogfight mode in the app. It consists of 4 BASIC PACKAGES, 4 PowerUp T-shirts in 2 different colors, and 4 PowerUp hats — for the ultimate team dogfighting experience!

CAPTAIN’S KIT --  Receive the PERFECT PACKAGE in an aluminum pilot hard case along with an exclusive PowerUp 3.0-branded pilot hat and a flight jacket with your name and "I backed PowerUp 3.0 on Kickstarter” stitched on it.
